message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.AI. 

This paper is primarily focused on database systems, specifically replicated databases, and the optimization of their indexes. Therefore, cs.DB (Databases) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses load balancing and system reconfiguration, which are relevant to distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The use of linear optimization techniques to solve the problem of selecting an optimal design is a common technique in operations research and management science, which are related to systems engineering (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques to monitor the workload and detect changes, which is relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
